info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:18PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN SPARTANBURG AND UNION COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 218 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Union, or 5 miles southwest of Buffalo, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Union, Monarch Mill, Buffalo, Carlisle, Rose Hill State Park, Cross Keys, Cross Anchor, Sedalia, Adamsburg, and Santuc. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
